org.openimaj.web

Class ProgrammaticBrowser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.web.ProgrammaticBrowser

  • public class ProgrammaticBrowser
extends Object
    An offscreen web-browser that can be accessed programmatically. Allows rendering to an MBFImage, etc.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProgrammaticBrowser

        public ProgrammaticBrowser()
        Default constructor. Uses an DefaultBrowserDelegate, so you wont see any dialogs, etc.

      • ProgrammaticBrowser

        public ProgrammaticBrowser(BrowserDelegate delegate)
        Construct with given delegate object. Setting the delegate to null will enable default behavior - i.e. dialogs will be drawn on the screen!
        Parameters:
        delegate -
